subject: French Open (Tennis)
Officiating (Sports)
Tennis
Instant Replay (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In an era of instant replays, there is an old-world charm to ball marks, imprints of evidence left behind when the ball hits a clay court.
snippet: In an era of instant replays, there is an old-world charm to ball marks, imprints of evidence left behind when the ball hits a clay court.
